text: 'in hadhih alsuwrat euzatan lilealamayna, faman 'arad alkhayr linafsih fi aldunya walakhirat atakhadh bial'iiman waltaqwaa tryqana yuasiluh 'iilaa maghfirat allah waridwaniha. wama turidun amrana min al'umur 'illa bitaqdir allah wamushyiatiha. 'iina allah kan elymana bi'ahwal khalqihi, hkymana fi tadbirih wasaneiha. yudkhl man yasha' min eibadih fi rahmatih waridwaniha, wahum almuminuna, waedd lilzaalimin almutajawizin hudud allah edhabana mwjeana
